title: Online Auction System
description: A complete online auction system with user authentication, MongoDB integration, and a responsive UI using HTML, CSS, JS, and Python Flask. Includes login/register with glassmorphism, dynamic data storage, and working routes.

title: Ecommerce Website
description: A responsive ReactJS e-commerce website for selling indoor and outdoor games with stunning carousels and smooth UI. Features include product listings, shopping cart, and dynamic navigation.
tech: ReactJS, React Hooks, CSS, HTML, React Icons

title: Railway Management System
description: A desktop-based Railway Management System built using Java Swing, enabling users to book tickets, check train schedules, and manage passenger data through an interactive GUI.

title: IPL Score Prediction
description: A machine learning-based IPL score prediction web app using Python for backend logic and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a dynamic and responsive frontend interface.

title: Travel Booking Website
description: A full-stack Spring Boot application designed to manage backend operations efficiently, integrating with a web-based frontend for seamless user interaction. It supports REST APIs, database management, and real-time data processing.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot, Maven, Mysqls
